casebody.data:
Glenn Franklin ANDERSON, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant-Appellee. No. 00-5107. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Feb. 6, 2001. Rehearing Denied March 5, 2001.

Before LOURIE, GAJARSA, and DYK, Circuit Judges.

JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
